Content: Having some issues with my Honda 550 Nighthawks 6-speed the 1983 I'm only running on two cylinders and getting gas in oil. it's a great looking bike almost man except for I've kind of cut it down like a bobber and put some different bars on it and a headlight and turning signals well you know project bike I haven't been able to ride it in 2 years had five surgeries in the past year and taking it most of my time healing and any advice you can give me on getting this 1983 piece of history (as I too was manufactured back in"83" . "Vintage"ðŸ˜Ž) back on the road would be greatly appreciated , thank you.
